titleStmt.title: The martyrdom of Theodora and of Didymus by a person of honour.
titleStmt.author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. Clark, for John Taylor ... and Christopher Skegnes ...,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Robert Boyle. Cf. BLC.
First edition; published later (1703) under title: Love and religion demonstrated in the martyrdom of Theodora, and of Didymus.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
